titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-399, by Mr. Linder.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 138.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 465.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 211 - 179 (Roll no. 672).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 182 (Roll no. 673).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/8/2003--Passed House without amendment. Waives a specified requirement of rule XIII with respect to a reported resolution providing for consideration or disposition of a bill or joint resolution making FY 2004 continuing or general appropriations, any amendment thereto, or any conference report thereon.
